Sequence Information.Peptide Name: WW306 (Verine-L, Synthetic AMPs, Trp-rich, Arg-rich; XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature.Author: Lakshmaiah Narayana J, Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Wu Q, Chhonker YS, Zhang Y, Zarena D, Salnikov ES, Dang X, Wang F, Murphy C, Foster KW, Gorantla S, Bechinger B, Murry DJ, Wang G.2020
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2020 Aug 11;117(32):19446-19454. doi: 10.1073/pnas.2005540117.PubMed
Literature.Title: Two distinct amphipathic peptide antibiotics with systemic efficacy.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is poorly similar (87.5%) toverine. W=R: 38%. This peptide has the same amino acid composition as horine.Activity: active against S. aureus M838-17 (MIC 3.1 uM), P. aeruginosa E411-17 (MIC 6.25 uM), and K. pneumoniae E406-17 (MIC 6.25 uM).Toxicity: human RBC:  hemolytic (HC50 60 uM).
